title: Template:Jupiter
source:
{{Navbox | name = Jupiter | title = [[Jupiter]] | image = [[Image:Portrait of Jupiter from Cassini.jpg|100px|NASA image of Jupiter]] | state = {{{state|autocollapse}}} | bodyclass = hlist | above = * [[Outline of Jupiter]] |group1 = Geography | list1 = * [[Atmosphere of Jupiter|Atmosphere]] ** [[Great Red Spot]] * [[Magnetosphere of Jupiter|Magnetosphere]] * [[Rings of Jupiter|Rings]] * [[Jupiter's North Pole]] * [[Jupiter's South Pole]] |group2 = [[Moons of Jupiter|Moons]] | list2 = {{Navbox|subgroup|group1 = Inner moons | list1 = * [[Metis (moon)|Metis]] * [[Adrastea (moon)|Adrastea]] * [[Amalthea (moon)|Amalthea]] * [[Thebe (moon)|Thebe]] |group2 = [[Galilean moons]] | list2 = * [[Io (moon)|Io]] * [[Europa (moon)|Europa]] * [[Ganymede (moon)|Ganymede]] * [[Callisto (moon)|Callisto]] |group3 = Irregular moons | list3 = * [[Himalia group]] * [[Themisto (moon)|Themisto]] * [[Carpo (moon)|Carpo]] * [[Valetudo (moon)|Valetudo]] * [[Ananke group]] * [[Carme group]] * [[Pasiphae group]] }} |group3 = Astronomy | list3 = {{Navbox|subgroup |group1 = General | list1 = * [[List of Jupiter-crossing minor planets|Jupiter-crossing minor planets]] * [[Solar eclipses on Jupiter|Solar eclipses]] |group2 = [[Jupiter trojan|Trojans]] | list2 = * [[List of Jupiter trojans (Greek camp)|Greek camp]] * [[List of Jupiter trojans (Trojan camp)|Trojan camp]] |group3 = [[Impact events on Jupiter|Impact events]] | list3 = * [[Comet Shoemaker–Levy 9]] * [[2009 Jupiter impact event]] * [[2010 Jupiter impact event]] }} |group4 = [[Exploration of Jupiter|Exploration]] and
